text: Nelly Meden (1928–2004) was an Argentine film, stage and television actress.Klossner p.81 ==Selected filmography== * White Horse Inn (1948) * Los secretos del buzón (1948) * La serpiente de cascabel (1948) * The Unwanted (1951) * The Count of Monte Cristo (1953) * El Último perro (1956) * The Whole Year is Christmas (1960) * This Earth Is Mine (1961) * By Killing (1965) == References == == Bibliography == * Klossner, Michael. The Europe of 1500-1815 on Film and Television: A Worldwide Filmography of Over 2550 Works, 1895 Through 2000. McFarland & Company, 2002. == External links == * Category:1928 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Actresses from Rosario, Santa Fe Category:Argentine stage actresses Category:Argentine film actresses Category:Argentine television actresses
title: Nelly Meden
